text: lw 'anzalna hdha alquran ealaa jabal min aljbal, ffhm ma fih min waead wweyd, labsarth ealaa quatuh wshdt slabth wdkhamth, khadeana dhlyla mtshqqana min khashyat allah teala. watilk al'amthal ndrbha, wnwdhha llnas; laealahum yatafakarun fi qudrat allah wezmth. wafi alayat hatha ealaa tdbr alqran, wtfhm meanyh, waleamal bh
